column10: This is a dangerous intersection. I personally have almost been hit by a car in this crosswalk with a walk signal three times.

This lady was extremely aggressive towards me, she came almost at full speed at me and stopped the last second then screamed “f- you you f-Ing b-“ and stuck up her middle finger at me after coming full speed on a right turn across an active crosswalk
column26: 1006, n sycamore street falls church va 22046

column10: Driver going east on Washington Blvd had red light and stopped blocking the crosswalk while a woman was in it crossing
column26: 782 N Howard St, Apt 104, Alexandria, VA 22304

column10: Despite a crosswalk with lighted pedestrian push sign, because of the on-ramp to 66 West and is essentially a 4 lane road, drivers regularly are significantly above the speed limit and are not looking for pedestrians. In this particular incident, I was crossing with the pedestrian lights were flashing and about half-way I had to abruptly stop due to a car almost hitting me.

Cyclist traveling southbound on N Tuckahoe didn't stop at the stop sign for 19th St. N. Drive slammed on the breaks to avoid hitting cyclist potentially causes a rear end collision with trailing cars.
